definition: to raise/to dig up/to poke/to prick/to incite/to stir up
to carry on a shoulder pole/to choose/to pick/to nitpick
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to provoke/to entice/to lure/to tantalize/to tease/to titillate
to play a leading role/to bear a heavy responsibility

sentences.english: Shepherd's purse green season, and grandmother would have to accompany her mother to pick the fields shepherd's purse.
sentences.chinese: 荠菜青青时节，外婆便要母亲陪着去田野里挑荠菜。

sentences.english: My wife keeps pecking at me.
sentences.chinese: 我老婆不断地挑我的毛病。

sentences.english: I'll choose a good horse to climb the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 我要挑一匹好马登上山去。

sentences.english: Who would have thought things are unpredictable, they are also very pick.
sentences.chinese: 谁知世事难料，她们也都很挑。

sentences.english: The foreign guest picked some music tapes with our help. He was pleased and thanked us a lot.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的帮助下这位外国友人挑了一些音乐磁带。

sentences.english: He was tossed by the bull.
sentences.chinese: 他被这头公牛用角挑了起来。

sentences.english: I remember Thierry Henry flicking a ball over his head and scoring.
sentences.chinese: 我记得亨利轻挑一个球越过他头顶，然后破门。

sentences.english: I went to the fabric store to pick the material for my curtains.
sentences.chinese: 我去布店挑了几块面料做窗帘。

sentences.english: I chose the best basket of red bayberries to eat. I put the rest in my refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 我挑了一篮最好的杨梅吃，并把一些放在冰箱里。

sentences.english: Bill: "If you had the chance to pick first, which one would you pick?"
sentences.chinese: 如果你先拿，你会挑哪一份牛排呢？

sentences.english: Hi. I'm looking for a gift for my niece.
sentences.chinese: 您好，我想为我侄女挑一件礼物。

sentences.english: He picked out Wazza, and he stretched his leg out and managed to guide it past the keeper.
sentences.chinese: 他将球挑给鲁尼，后者伸长了腿，让球越过了门将。

sentences.english: Welcome to GFC, Pick you want.
Also select a comfortable pair of gloves to keep your hands and fingernails soft and chap-free.
sentences.chinese: 挑一双温暖的手套，保持手部皮肤柔软避免皲裂。

sentences.english: Hey, did you pick a roommate?
Canopy overhangs scale here too, can reduce?
sentences.chinese: 此处雨篷出挑尺度太大，能否减小？

definition: good-looking/nice-looking/good (of a movie, book, TV show etc)/embarrassed/humiliated
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
as one wishes/as one pleases/at random/negligent/casual/wanton
to look upon/to take a fancy to/to fall for
to fight over/to rush/to scramble/to grab/to rob/to snatch
to start/to put one's hand to/to set about/the seat to the right of the main guest
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
to come to an agreement/to complete negotiations
to try to find/to look for/to call on sb/to find/to seek/to return/to give change
